content: Ask most people under age of 30 to quote a joke from Eddie Murphy’s movie Delirious and you may get a joke or two, maybe….….then, ask that same person to quote a joke from the Charlie Murphy story about Rick James. You might get the entire episode, verbatim. Charlie accomplished something even he could have never imagined: he has become a part of American Popular Culture. As long as The Chappelle Show is relevant, his contribution to comedy will never be forgotten.
